title: WTT/Wtb: Cobb/Young or Upgrade Matty Port
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTT/Wtb: Cobb/Young or Upgrade Matty Port
posts.post_content:
Please email [url]wazywhoa@gmail.com[/url] for pictures or PM to text. 



Thought I’d offer some trade bait: 

I am looking to potentially achieve a couple things —

1. Use the attached trade bait toward t206 Cobb’s or Young portrait. 

Attached are 
(1) Green Cobb SGC 1 
(2) Mathewson portraits, Both SGC 1.5
(2) Piedmont 350 Elite 11 - (Jones / Schaefer)
EPDG 2.5 Jennings Two Hands. 

2. Upgrade either of my Matty portraits to a higher grade portrait. I have (2) 1.5s. Maybe combine into a SUPER MATTY.
